title: PlayStation Pulls Out of PAX East - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.19.20
description:
Get started with your first month free by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily.

If you go to http://getquip.com/games right now, you’ll get your first refill free!

Gary Whitta and Greg discuss the breaking news that PlayStation won't go to PAX East due to coronavirus concerns.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:50 - Breaking News: Sony Cancels PAX
00:08:35 - Housekeeping
WE’RE GIVING AWAY KNIGHTS AND BIKES ON SWITCH!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis, Frankfurter, Drew Gardiner, Katie Gallacher, David Meintel, BLACK JACK, Dominic Shorter, Mohammed Mohammed, Patrick Higgins, Ginny Berndt, The Nano Biologist, Travis  Guy-kow-ski, Joseph Soler
The Roper Report   -
00:15:08 - Smash Bros. Update, via Nibel pointing to the PushDustin Translation of Famitsu column…
00:23:45 -  Animal Crossing Direct Tomorrow!
00:31:00 - Are we gamers just entitled, spoiled brats when it comes to knowing what the next big news is, or are we truly deserving as consumers to know what a company's plan is? - Best Friends Q:GroovyMuse
00:36:18 - THQ Nordic’s Moves
00:54:00 - Dangerous Driving 2 Announced
00:57:10 - Out today
00:59:45 -  HIMS
01:02:00 - QUIP
01:05:11 - Squad Up: Ricky Mcflyy(PC [Division 2]) - rickymcflyy
01:07:57 - Required Reading:
GameStop employees report extreme pressure from ‘desperate’ bosses
https://www.polygon.com/2020/2/19/21132128/gamestop-employees-report-extreme-pressure-desperate-bosses
Polygon - Colin Campbell
The Truth About Working at GameStop: Workers Reveal Their Experiences
https://www.ign.com/articles/the-truth-about-working-at-gamestop-workers-reveal-their-experiences?sf117655965=1
Logan Plant - IGN
01:10:00 You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
01:10:32 - Post Show
